original_text: Then he remembered the days of old, Moses, and his people, saying, Where is he that brought them up out of the sea with the shepherd of his flock? where is he that put his holy Spirit within him?
korean_text: 백성이 옛적 모세의 때를 기억하여 이르되 백성과 양 떼의 목자를 바다에서 올라오게 하신 이가 이제 어디 계시냐 그들 가운데에 성령을 두신 이가 이제 어디 계시냐

sentences.original_text: Then he remembered the days of old
that brought them up out of the sea
with the shepherd of his flock?
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 양 떼의 목자와 함께 있는가?

sentences.original_text: that put his holy Spirit within him?
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 거룩한 영을 그 안에 두신 분이?
